info.description:
A production-ready RESTful API for barbershop booking system.
Features include: User authentication, Barber management, Service catalog, Booking system, Review & Rating system, and Notification system.
info.title: Barbershop Booking API

post.description: Change the password of the currently authenticated user
Authenticate user and return JWT token
Logout the current user (client should delete the token)

get.description: Get the profile of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile of the currently authenticated user

post.description: Generate a new JWT token from an existing valid token
Create a new user account and return JWT token
Add a service to a barber's offerings (protected)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific barber service

delete.description: Remove a service from a barber's offerings (protected)

get.description: Get list of all barbers with optional filters
Search barbers by query string
Get detailed information about a specific barber by UUID
Get all services offered by a specific barber
Get detailed information about a specific barber
Get all bookings for a specific barber
Get booking statistics (total, completed, cancelled, revenue) for a barber
get.summary: Get booking statistics for a barber

get.description: Get all bookings scheduled for today for a specific barber
get.summary: Get today's bookings for a barber

get.description: Get all published reviews for a specific barber
Get review statistics (ratings distribution, average) for a barber
Get comprehensive statistics for a barber
Check if a specific time slot is available for a barber
Get all bookings for the authenticated customer
Get detailed information about a specific booking by its human-readable booking number
Get detailed information about a specific booking by UUID
Get detailed information about a specific booking
Get the audit trail of changes for a booking

put.description: Change the scheduled time of a booking

patch.description: Update the status of a booking (pending  confirmed  in_progress  completed)

get.description: Get all notifications for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new notification for a user (admin only)
Send a notification related to a booking

patch.description: Mark all notifications for the authenticated user as read

get.description: Get notification statistics for the authenticated user
Get unread notifications for the authenticated user
Get the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user
Get detailed information about a specific notification

patch.description: Mark a specific notification as read

post.description: Webhook endpoint for push notification delivery callbacks
Create a review for a completed booking

get.description: Get the review for a specific booking
Check if the authenticated user can review a specific booking
get.summary: Check if booking can be reviewed

get.description: Get all reviews created by the authenticated customer
Get all reviews pending moderation (admin only)
Get detailed information about a specific review

put.description: Update a review (only by author and before moderation)

delete.description: Delete a review (soft delete by author or admin)

patch.description: Update the moderation status of a review (admin only)

post.description: Allow a barber to respond to a review on their profile
post.summary: Add barber response to a review

post.description: Vote whether a review was helpful or not

get.description: Get list of all services from the catalog with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by service type (haircut, styling, treatment, grooming)
parameters.name: service_type

parameters.description: Filter by target gender (male, female, all)
parameters.name: target_gender

parameters.description: Sort by field (name, popularity, rating, duration, complexity)
parameters.name: sort_by

post.description: Create a new service in the catalog (admin only)

get.description: Get list of all service categories
Get detailed information about a specific category
Search services by query string
Get detailed information about a specific service by its URL slug
Get detailed information about a specific service
Get all barbers that offer a specific service

customer_id.description: Customer info (either customer_id OR guest info)

service_price.description: Pricing (optional - will be calculated if not provided)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

tags.description: User registration, login, and authentication management
tags.name: Authentication

tags.description: Customer reviews and ratings for barbers
tags.name: Reviews
